Name: White Mourning: Museum In Pale
About the game: This is a Disco Elysium fan game. In the way of pixel RPG, this museum is built to display the illustrations in White Mourning, the fanart collection. You can wander around freely as Harry. The game contains some puzzles, and there is no linear task or plot - time is invalid here. Just explore and collect, this museum is all about YOU, Harry.
